reviewText: Tables & Ladders & Chairs "o my"O my in deed, this video will feature 3 of the most 'jaw dropping' matches in WWF history.This DVD focuses on the 3 top wwf tag teams in the WWF:-Hardy Boyz- Ladders-Dudly Boyz- Tables-Edge & Christian- ChairsEach team explains of what they think and the dangers of it.You will see the 3 teams talking about who they idolised as youngsters and explain the matches they watched such as Ramon/Michaels Ladder match Summerslam 95.You will 1st see Edge and Christian and Hadyz boyz when they 1st turned up the notch at No mercy 99 in the 1st ever tag team Ladder match.It was like nothing we ever seen, it was an amazing display of what can be used with Ladders and later to become match of the yr.Then you will see the fued of the Dudly Boyz and the Hardy Boyz which ends up in Madison Square Garden at the 2000 Royal Rumble in the WWF's 1st Table match.The object is to drive you opponents offensively through Tables.Ive never seen so many tables in a WWF match, the Dudlyz with there Tables and the Hardyz with there suicidle dives puts on a spectacular show which no other Table match have beaten.Its WRESTLEMANIA baby and all 3 teams meet in a death defying Triangle Ladder match, and yes it did live up to everyones expectations.As there were so many Bumps and great spots it was a wonder they walked out.There was no boring bits as did everything fast paced and no stalling.The triangle Ladder match soon turned into a Ladder/Tables match as Dudleyz put opponents and them selves through tables.This indeed was the show stealer of Wrestlemania.All in ALL I recomend this to anyone who watches wrestling, you will not be dissapionted in this action packed fast paced WWF DVD.HIGHLY RECOMENDED
summary: 3 MATCHES THAT CHANGED THE WWF FOR EVER
Title: N/A

reviewText: "For the benefit of those of you with flash photography," look no further than this video for pure action.  The World Wrestling Federation  has constantly been on top of its game when it comes to comming up with new  angles for its wrestling matches.  Well, throw in some tables, ladders, and  chairs, and you have nothing but pure unadulterated excitement.This  video is action packed, and takes in-depth looks at Matt and Jeff Hardy,  Edge and Christian, and Buh-Buh Ray and Devon D-D-D-Dudley.  Not only are  these three of the most exciting tag teams in wrestling today, but they are  all interesting characters, and have great wrestling personas.The WWF  is constantly outdoing itself, and this video is another great product from  their flourishing company.  The action is non-stop in "Tables Ladders  Chairs" and you will be pleasantly surprised and greatly entertained.  This video is a must for any fan of the WWF.
summary: Everyone Could Use a Little TLC

reviewText: When you hear the words "Tables, Ladders, Chairs", six men should pop into your head right away as if it wasn't for them, the concept behind these three words put together wouldn't have revolutionized this business on so many levels.  This is the story behind the feud between Matt & Jeff Hardy, Bubba & Devon Dudley, Edge & Christian.  Now this is a VHS/DVD release that WWE did which chronicled how the feud between these three teams developed in their own words.The story behind all three teams growing up, who influenced whom, and getting in the business begins the documentary with footage of the Hardys when they were kids along with Jeff talking about how he wanted to quit after his first match.  The story of the Hardy Boys vs. Edge & Christian feud revolving around Gangrel & The Brood leading up to the No Mercy tag team ladder match is discussed next with each team reliving various spots & moments in detail from the match along with the importance of the respect they gained afterwards which launched them from "workers to superstars."  The events leading up to & highlights of the Royal Rumble tables match between the Hardys & Dudleys is shown next with Bubba & Devon talking about how this feud "allowed them to be the Dudleys" before going into their reign of terror with the tables by taking out everyone they could get their hands on from Terri to Lita to Trish Stratus to Mae Young (TWICE!).  The documentary closes with all 3 teams reviewing their ladder match at WrestleMania 2000 with the biggest story being of who was the first person to share their hands backstage after the match.This presentation was pretty short & simple buy looking back at it today, it seems very incomplete because history has shown that this feud wasn't over for either team as it would lead to the creation of the actual "T.L.C." match which all three teams participated in the first three.  It was a nice detailed look at the beginning of this feud & I would recommend for those who are fans of the early stages feud but past that, you can pass on this because no complete matches are on here & as I just said, it only chronicles up to the WrestleMania 2000 Ladder match before the actual "T.L.C." match was created.
summary: The Beginnings Of The Hottest Tag Team Feud In The Attitude Era

reviewText: This was an amazing video.Clips includeThe Brood w/ Gangrel, Edge and ChristainThe departure of Edge and Cristian from the BroodThe New Brood w/ Gangrel and the HardyzInterviews w/ Dudleyz, Hardyz and E & CMany chair shots, some that don't include the three teams mentioned above.Highlights of Matt and Jeff's first matches in the WWF.Shawn and Razor's ladder match at SummerSlam '95Highlights from the Terri Invatational Tournament, including the ladder match at No Mercy '99Dudley Boyz vs. Hardy Boyz in the table match at the 2000  Royal Rumbleand the triple threat ladder match for the Tag Team titles at WMXVIWhat an amazing video, showcasig three teams,six men's willingness to put their bodies on the line to entertain the fans. I recomend this video to all wrestling fans.

reviewText: The WWF's best is when they do TLC, Tables, Ladders, and Chairs. This show shows about the champs of TLC, the Dudlyz, Edge and Christian, and my  favorite, the Hardyz. Also, Matt and Jeff Hardy are a lot better than all  these famous WWF wrestlers like The Rock, Stone Cold, or The Undertaker. So  get this movie because of how it tells about the Hardyz!

reviewText: The Hardyz, Dudleyz and E&C; are the stars in this video.Tag Team Ladder Match E&C; vs Hardyz- Great match. Tons of high spots. Hardyz win and get Terri's services.Tag Team Table Match Royal Rumble 2000 Dudleys vs Hardyz- Another Great match. Nice Swaton of the balcony by Jeff so the Hardyz could pick up the win.WrestleMania 16 Triangle Ladder Match E&C; vs Hardyz vs Dudleyz- Best match on here. This match has so many good spots. E&C; win the tag titles.During this video they have clips of tons of chair shots, tables getting crushed and injuries. This is a great video. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
